document.forum_title: Latest Press Releases News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: Putnam Announces Distribution Rates for Open End Funds
document.topic_text: Putnam Announces Distribution Rates for Open End Funds Monday, 25 April 2016 ( 19 minutes ago ) BOSTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)--The Trustees of The Putnam Funds declared the following distributions. RECORD/ PAYMENT FUND NAME AND DISTRIBUTIONS EX DATE DATE Putnam Global Income Trust – Class B Shares (PGLBX) $0.0240 per share investment income 4/25/2016 4/29/2016 Putnam Global Income Trust – Class C Shares (PGGLX) $0.0250 per share investment income 4/25/2016 4/29/2016 Putnam Global Income Trust – Class M Shares (PGGMX) $0.0300 per share investment income 4/25/2016 4/29/2016 Putnam
